casebody.data:
AMOS SMITH, PLAINTIFF-RESPONDENT, v. BOARD OF CHOSEN FREEHOLDERS OF THE COUNTY OF BERGEN AND STEPHEN J. CUCCIO, COUNTY ADMINISTRATOR OF THE COUNTY OF BERGEN AND JOHN DOE, TRUE NAME UNKNOWN, DEFENDANTS-APPELLANTS. Superior Court of New Jersey Appellate Division Submitted December 6, 1976 Decided January 7, 1977.

Before Judges Pritz, Crahay and Ard.

Mr. Vincent P. Rigolosi, attorney for appellants {Mr. Leon B. Savetsky on the brief). *46Messrs. Modes, Felzenberg & Randall, attorneys for respondent {Mr. Robert M. Smith on the brief). Per Curiam.

The judgment of the trial court is affirmed for the reasons set forth in the comprehensive opinion of Judge Lester.
